alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton; Potter (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:07PM EDT until April 01 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... Potter County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 307 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shinglehouse to Cameron to Woodland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... State College, Lock Haven, Bellefonte, Park Forest Village, Carroll, Woodward, Boalsburg, Wharton, Keating, Pleasant Gap, Philipsburg and Coudersport. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Kylertown and Mile Run exits, specifically from mile markers 139 to 193. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 56 to 85. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
